name: Chan Hua Jian
aboutMe: Software Engineer. Experienced in Mobile Application Development with Flutter. Passionate about learning new technologies and improving coding skills. Always eager to take on new challenges and contribute to the success of the team and organization.

work.description:
Led the end-to-end development and maintenance of a Financial Superapp, integrating native SDKs and extending platform functionality via Flutter Method Channels. Successfully deployed multiple production-ready applications to the Apple App Store, Google Play, and Huawei AppGallery. 
Technologies: Flutter, VueJS, TypeScript, Swift (iOS), Kotlin (Android)

Created admin portal front-end screens with the team with high performance, security and quality, in charge of mapping multiple APIs data, and managed to give a presentation of the product developed with the team to the key stakeholders from Singapore. 
Technologies: Low-code platform

projects.title: Minimalist CV
projects.description: This CV website built with Flutter which inspired by Bartosz Jarocki.

projects.title: Malaysia Petrol Price Monitoring
projects.description: A simple Flutter web application that monitors petrol prices in Malaysia.
